txt.en: Iach can be found near the eastern gate of Mossward.\n\nReturn to Iach.
Kingsfoil can be found at the Howlingstones south-east of Mossward.\n\nCollect kingsfoil.
Healer Iach asks you to pick more Kingsfoil. Unfortunately, it happens to be in the wolves' habitat.
'Kingsfoil can be found at the ruins to the south-east. Be careful of the wolves!'
'Thank you. With this I should have more than enough to continue tending to the injured, perhaps with a little extra in case an emergency comes to pass....'
TBD 'The Kingsfoil I need can be found near the wolf den nearby. Be careful while picking it so as not to bruise the leaves!'
'Thank you. With this I should have more than enough to continue tending to the injured, perhaps with a little extra in case an emergency comes to pass....'

'This kingsfoil herb works wonders! I'm grateful that Meneldir shared his knowledge with us, though I wish he didn't wait until a crisis to do so. In any case, we need more if we hope to continue treating the injured with such efficacy.\n\n'Now that I know what it looks like, I realize that kingsfoil grows aplenty in the Howlingstones to the south-east. I'd be grateful if you could gather more. Just... watch out for the wolves. I hear they are ill-tempered as of late.'
'Kingsfoil can be found at the ruins to the southeast. Be careful of the wolves!'
TBD 'Thank you. With this I should have more than enough to continue tending to the injured, perhaps with a little extra in case an emergency comes to pass...'
